00019 #ifndef _IPL98_KERNEL_STRING_H
00020 #define _IPL98_KERNEL_STRING_H

00028 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00029 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00030 #endif
00031 
00044 typedef struct {
00046         unsigned int NumberOfChars;
00049         unsigned int AllocatedChars; /* internal use */
00051         char* pChars;
00052 } TString;
00053

00146 #define k_AddFileAndLine(str) {char* i=(char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*25);k_AddCharToString('(',&str);k_AddCharArrayToString(__FILE__,&str);sprintf(i," line %d",__LINE__);k_AddCharArrayToString(i,&str);k_AddCharToString(')',&str);free(i);};
